title: Make Valentine Annie have pink fire :D!
body:
So, i like the skin, and i would buy it without a thought, if it wasn't for the fact that the fire is the same as normal Annie's. I mean, Rito changed the fire on Frostfire Annie to have blue ice effects and that's a 520 skin. The fact that a skin that is less expensive than this one has effects means that it wouldn't hurt to add a different color to the fire, maybe with some hearts mixed into the effects, like how Frostfire has snowflakes mixed in. And, since Annie's new skin is basically a miniature, cuter version of Heartseeker Ashe, it stands to reason that pink effects to Annie's fire is prefectly normal and fits into the theme. I love Annie and i want the new skin, but pink fire would make it much more worth it to me considering that Frostfire has effects and is 250 RP cheaper than Valentine's Annie.

EDIT: I do know that NOW Frostfire  is 975 RP, but when i started playing she was 520 RP forever and that's how much she was when i actually got the skin.

P.S. And let's not forget that Sherwood Forest Ashe is 520 RP and she has green tinged arrows, so even if you don't count Annie's Frostfire skin as viable in this argument, there are still skins cheaper than her new 750 RP skin that have effect changes.

Hi there! 

Although Sweetheart Annie Valentine's Day themed, she's not part of the Heartseeker line. (She's way more cute than she is sexy, which is why we opted for 'Sweetheart' as opposed to 'Heartseeker'!) 

To your point of Frostfire Annie, she's actually a 975 RP skin! We've created [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Skin-RP-Price-Changes), which outlines the kinds of things you can expect for each price tier when it comes to skins. 

Over the past few months, you may have seen that there's been a bit more diversity in skin prices - more legendary, more 1350 RP skins, and more 750 RP skins.  We try to come out with skins that fall into various price tiers so more people have an opportunity to grab a skin they enjoy, since not everyone can afford (or want to buy) some of the higher priced skins. 

Unfortunately, for this skin, she won't be receiving new particles, and will be using base particles.
